TopicTitle: Jerry Anderson Jet Fighter Mk I

Articles.Content:
Its about as agile as a brick...

But looks really nice.

Rather easy to land too, which is nice..
Good job, quite an attractive plane. Have you considered attaching more control surfaces?

Nice. As said above, maybe needs a bit more control surface.

Here's a Gerry Anderson plane I've been inspired by to reproduce, or at least the principle of it.

Edited May 9, 2015 by Foxster

Well done.

As suggested, adding some control surfaces (ailerons or elevons out near the wingtips, more elevators up back) will make it maneuverable.

(oh, and PS: Gerry Anderson, not Jerry)

Moved over to the Spacecraft Exchange, the place to share your cool craft.

Nice plane, I love Gerry Anderson's stuff and you've captured the aesthetic well.
